channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Astrophysicists reveal structure of 74 exocomet belts orbiting nearby stars in landmark survey
item.description: Astrophysicists have imaged a large number of exocomet belts around nearby stars, and the tiny pebbles within them. The crystal-clear images show ligh...

item.title: Three million years ago, our ancestors were vegetarian
item.description: Human ancestors like Australopithecus -- which lived around 3.5 million years ago in southern Africa -- ate very little to no meat, according to new r...

item.title: NASA's Hubble traces hidden history of Andromeda galaxy
item.description: In the years following the launch of NASA's Hubble Space Telescope, astronomers have tallied over 1 trillion galaxies in the universe. But only one ga...

item.title: Fine-tuned brain-computer interface makes prosthetic limbs feel more real
item.description: Two new articles document progress in neuroprosthetic technology that lets people feel the shape and movement of objects moving over the 'skin' of a b...

item.title: New chainmail-like material could be the future of armor
item.description: Resembling the interlocking links in chainmail, novel nanoscale material is incredibly strong and flexible. The interlocked material contains 100 tril...
